CustomField.description: Determines the Tier that Contractor and Hiring Client Employer subscriptions are billed at.
CustomField.formula: IF (RAVS_Employee__c < 1, MAX( Avg_Employee_Initial__c , MSQ_Employee__c , RAVS_Employee__c , HCE_Employee__c ), MAX( MSQ_Employee__c , RAVS_Employee__c , HCE_Employee__c ) ) + Hierarchy_Employee_Count__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Avg Employee # is not considered when there is a RAVS Employee #
CustomField.label: Billing Employee Count
